name: Handwraps of nebular vapor
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity noticably.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ambidextrous attack'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'call for thunder'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of kungfu'.
The handwraps reveal new properties when charged with electricity.
The handwraps' wearer tires less easily.
